result.arabic_text: فَأَقۡبَلَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ فِي صَرَّةٖ فَصَكَّتۡ وَجۡهَهَا وَقَالَتۡ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٞ
result.translation: Umukenyezi wa Ibrahimu Sarah aho yumviye inkuru yuko azokwibaruka umwana, yaregereye hafi yabo, maze yikubita kw’itama yitangaza ati: “Bishoboka gute ko novyara kandi ndi umukecuru, nkaba ndi n’ingumba!”.
